definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: The goblin went into the small pot to show the fisherman how he can go in to the small pot.
sentences.chinese: 小妖精钻进小罐子给渔夫看他是怎样进去的。

sentences.english: That is the fairies' home. Get in and open the door.
sentences.chinese: 那就是小妖精的家，进去把那门打开，我等着你出来。

sentences.english: "Tin soldier, " said the goblin, "don't wish for what does not belong to you.
sentences.chinese: “锡兵，”小妖精说，“不要指望不属于你的东西。”

sentences.english: The goblin that torments a human really knows not to know what she is act.
sentences.chinese: 这个折磨人的小妖精究竟知不知道她在做什么。

sentences.english: But soon he was discovered by the goblins that lived in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 但是他随后就被居住在树林里的小妖精发现了。

sentences.english: If you must give me a name, call me hobgob-lin.
sentences.chinese: 如果你非得给我取名，就叫我小妖精吧。

sentences.english: If you must give me a name, call me hobgoblin.
sentences.chinese: 如果你非得给我取名，就叫我小妖精吧。

sentences.english: The goblin pounced on the fisherman.
It spreaded the leaves, showing the beauty unreservedly, my seductive.
sentences.chinese: 它伸展着叶子，毫无保留地展示着美丽，我的小妖精。

definition: erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
little demon (term of endearment for a child)/mischievous child/imp
